title: The great treaty of peace: or, A serious exhortation upon a sad occasion to double diligence about making peace with God Part whereof was preached at the funeral of Mrs. Anne Kyrl, April 6. 1677. To which is added, the character of that worthy gentlewoman. By H. S. minister of the Gospel.
author: H. S.
publisher: printed for John Hancock, at the sign of the Three Bibles in Popes Head Alley in Cornhil,
